# Core cloud + data
boto3==1.34.*

# PDF parsing
pypdf==4.*

# LangChain splitters (pure Python, safe for Lambda)
langchain-text-splitters==0.*

# OpenAI API (embeddings)
openai==1.*

# Pinecone client (vector DB)
pinecone-client==5.*

# (Optional) For local testing and debugging
tqdm==4.*         # nice progress bars
requests==2.*
